title: VFW holding Family Freedom Festival
maintext:
MOHAVE VALLEY — Veterans of Foreign Wars Post 404 Auxiliary will host its first-ever Family Freedom Festival on Saturday.
The event runs from noon to 3 p.m. MST at 10287 Barrackman Road in Mohave Valley.
The free family-friendly event will feature food, games and more. It’s a festival to celebrate the freedoms Americans enjoy and will include activities for all ages. Attend the event to learn about what the VFW Auxiliary does and can offer.
The VFW Auxiliary is one of the nation’s oldest veterans service organizations. Members are relatives of those who have served in overseas combat; represent all 50 states; and give millions of hours and millions of dollars to support veterans, military personnel and their families; as well as hundreds of thousands of dollars in scholarships for the nation’s youth.
